content:

2. Select your target (SimpleCP)
3. Go to "Build Phases" tab
4. Expand "Compile Sources"
5. Look for ClipboardManager+Folders.swift􀰓 - it might be:
   • Listed twice (old path + new path)
   • Missing entirely
   • Shown in red/gray (can't find it)

Then:
• If it's listed twice, remove the duplicate (select and click the minus button)

content:
Work through Areas 1-6 in order. Complete ALL tasks in each area before moving to the next. DO
  NOT wait for confirmation between areas.

  AREA 1: SWIFT FRONTEND DEVELOPMENT
  1. Create Xcode project file for SimpleCP-macOS directory
  2. Test API connectivity to Python backend at localhost:8080, verify GET /api/history works
  3. Implement search functionality - make search bar in ContentView filter clipboard history in
  real-time
  4. Add snippet save workflow - connect "Save as Snippet" buttons to POST /api/snippets endpoint

  AREA 2: BACKEND API ENHANCEMENT
  1. Add monitoring status endpoint - GET /api/status returns clipboard monitoring state and item
  counts
  2. Create export/import - GET /api/export and POST /api/import for snippet backup/restore
  3. Implement search API - POST /api/search with {"query": "text"} returns matching items
  4. Add stats endpoint - GET /api/stats returns usage statistics and folder counts

  AREA 3: TESTING & VALIDATION
  1. Write API tests using pytest for all endpoints in api/endpoints.py
  2. Create test data generator script to populate clipboard with sample data for testing
  3. Add error handling with proper HTTP error responses for invalid requests
  4. Achieve 90% coverage - run pytest --cov and ensure 90%+ test coverage

  AREA 4: ADVANCED FEATURES
  1. Clipboard history persistence - save/load history across app restarts using JSON files
  2. Smart deduplication - prevent duplicate clipboard entries with content hashing
  3. Auto-categorization - detect URLs, emails, code snippets automatically and tag them
  4. Keyboard shortcuts - global hotkeys for quick access (⌘⌥V, ⌘⌥1-9)

  AREA 5: PRODUCTION READINESS
  1. Error logging - comprehensive logging system for debugging with log files
  2. Configuration system - settings file (config.json) for user customization
  3. Performance optimization - memory management and efficient data structures
  4. Documentation - API docs (OpenAPI/Swagger) and user guides in markdown

  AREA 6: DEPLOYMENT PREPARATION
  1. Build scripts - automated build and packaging scripts for both Python and Swift
  2. Installation process - macOS app bundle creation with proper structure
  3. Version management - semantic versioning system and release notes template
  4. Distribution - app signing and notarization preparation scripts

  CONSTRAINTS FOR ALL AREAS:
  - 250-line file limit STRICTLY ENFORCED
  - Use flake8 --max-line-length=88 for validation
  - Test all changes before committing
  - Complete each area fully before moving to next

  EXECUTE ALL 6 AREAS WITHOUT STOPPING. SimpleCP daemon running at localhost:8080.
display_string: Work through Areas 1-6 in order. Complete ALL t...
